EmailTemplate.name: Follow up from Turbonomic Survey (1494941170.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow up from Turbonomic Survey (1494941170.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 98 Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Neal,Thank you for completing the Turbonomic IT Maturity Survey! You should receive your Amazon Gift Card shortly.I can offer you another $100 Amazon Gift Card or a $100 donation to a charity of your choice if I can schedule 30 minutes between you and a Turbonomic Engineer. You indicated on your survey several challenges that Turbonomic directly addresses, specifically - Overprovisioned Infrastructure and Inefficiency - Turbonomic has been proven to reduce infrastructure requirements by 30% or more through intelligent consolidation - Troubleshooting/Proactive Monitoring - Turbonomic has been proven to decrease performance alerts by 80% or more through its patented automation engine - Service Degradation/Downtime - Turbonomic has been proven to increase application performance by 37% while eliminating 80% of tickets - Growth in Environment Complexity - Turbonomic’s vendor-agnostic, patented analytics have been proven to reduce infrastructure requirements by 30% or more through intelligent automation Do you have some time to speak today? To receive your gift card or donation, you must schedule your consultation within the next 7 days and complete it within the next 14 days. Thank you,Katie Katie NorchiSales Development RepresentativeO: 857.305.4618 C: 440.708.8477500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
